channel.title: CVE Feed for Johnson Controls -- Metasys
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Johnson Controls -- Metasys

item.title: CVE-2021-27657|2024-09-17T00:51:44.651Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys
item.description: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could give an authenticated Metasys user an unintended level of access to the server file system, allowing them to access or modify system files by sending specifically crafted web messages to the Metasys system. This issue affects: Johnson Controls Metasys version 11.0 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2021-36202|2024-09-17T01:50:52.203Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Johnson Controls Metasys could allow an authenticated attacker to inject malicious code into the MUI PDF export feature. This issue affects: Johnson Controls Metasys All 10 versions versions prior to 10.1.5; All 11 versions versions prior to 11.0.2.
